text:
Trying to install Apache. Received the following message from Control Panel
Checking for prerequisites
4:03:00 PM  [main] 	All prerequisites found
4:03:00 PM  [main] 	Initializing Modules
4:03:00 PM  [Apache] 	Problem detected: Apache Not Found!
4:03:00 PM  [Apache] 	Disabling Apache buttons
4:03:00 PM  [Apache] 	Run this program from your XAMPP root directory!
4:03:00 PM  [mysql] 	Problem detected: MySQL Not Found!
4:03:00 PM  [mysql] 	Disabling MySQL buttons
4:03:00 PM  [mysql] 	Run this program from your XAMPP root directory!

Xampp was installed as c:/xampp - as instructed.
Looked thru httpd in conf. nothing.
Looked a config on control panel - was referencing httpd.conf - doesn't exist.
Same kind of message when trying to install MYsql
Where is it/
Thanks Ross
creator: rvman1949@att.net

text: This bugzilla is for reporting bugs in httpd, not for support of xampp.
creator: covener@gmail.com
